name: Glute Bridge
instruction: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Lift your hips off the mat, while keeping your back straight, and pause for 1 second. Return to the starting position and repeat the movement until the set is complete.
hints: When doing the glute bridge, press down through the heels to lift your hips and keep your core and glutes tight. Maintain the upper body relaxed and keep the knees bent at a 45-degree angle. Exhale as you lift your butt off the floor and inhale as you return to the starting position.
